beer.Name: Mayflower Pale
beer.Description: Based on our strong IPA Mayflower Gold but at a more easy drinking ABV. Dry hopped with Willamette & Cascade hops to give rich peachy aromas.

beer.Name: Vanilla Woods
beer.Description: A rich porter with vanilla.

beer.Name: Woody's Bite
beer.Description: A dark porter with chilli and lime.

beer.Name: Raisins To Be Cheerful
beer.Description: A black IPA brewed with raisins.

beer.Name: Ekuanot Pale
beer.Description: American hopped pale ale.

beer.Name: Hillfoot
beer.Description: Dark, traditional Best Bitter

beer.Name: Tempest Stout
beer.Description: Full bodied easy drinking stout.

beer.Name: Boston Brown Ale
beer.Description: American style brown ale so packed with hops but with a real brown maltiness to balance.

beer.Name: Brentwood Best
beer.Description: Made with a good dose of Challenger and EKG hops giving a well rounded flavour and aroma.

beer.Name: Decadence
beer.Description: A golden ale with a hint of malt sweetness from caramalt. Passionfruit and grapefruit aromas on the nose. First taste gives a complex zesty hop palate leading on to a fresh herby finish.

beer.Name: Rutterkin
beer.Description: A premium bitter with a golden appearance. A zesty hop flavour from Mount hood hops combine with a touch of malt sweetness to give a rich full bodied beer.

beer.Name: American Red
beer.Description: A rich, hoppy American Red ale.

beer.Name: Session IPA
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Neolithic
beer.Description: Hoppy pale ale

beer.Name: Neanderthal
beer.Description: Best Bitter

beer.Name: Prehistoric
beer.Description: Amber ale

beer.Name: Megalithic
beer.Description: Powerful, hoppy IPA

beer.Name: Salty Sea Dog
beer.Description: Strong Golden/Amber ale with hints of citrus fruit. Brewed using cascade amarillo fuggles and Celiea hops. Full malt and hop flavour with spicy final bitterness

beer.Name: Tumblehome
beer.Description: A gentle warming fruity aroma with a hint of hoppy floral character. The first flavour is of a fruity warmth followed by dark toffee character with by hints of roasted flavours. The finish is crisp spicy bitterness.

beer.Name: BRAZILIAN
beer.Description: Coffee and vanilla porter beautifully balanced.

beer.Name: Jack Spitty's Smuggler's Ale
beer.Description: Golden easy drinking summer ale. Delicate bitterness and light aroma

beer.Name: Metropolis
beer.Description: A superb golden hoppy beer with enormous depth of flavour and a long spicy finish. SILVER MEDAL SIBA EAST REGION.

beer.Name: SWEENEY TODD
beer.Description: A full flavoured best bitter with a deep red hue. Roasted malt flavours and a subtle dry spiciness provided by crystal rye. Delicate hop flavours from late additions of U.S Willamette hops.

beer.Name: Amarillo
beer.Description: A superb premium golden ale with wonderful aroma and a lasting spicy flavour.

beer.Name: Brewers Gold
beer.Description: Supreme Champion Beer of Britain at the Great British Beer Festival 2005 AND 2006 this is a pale refreshing and hoppy beer with gorgeous aromas of tropical fruits.

beer.Name: Chinook
beer.Description: A tart clean & very pale beer.

beer.Name: Festival Special
beer.Description: A one-off special created by Crouch Vale especially for Thurrock Beer Festival.

beer.Name: Ruby Mild
beer.Description: Pale, wheat and chocolate malts take centre-stage with low hop bitterness to offer a smooth, malty style.

beer.Name: Yakima Gold
beer.Description: A very pale beer utilising finest Amarillo hops. Delicious!

beer.Name: American Pale Ale
beer.Description: Classic dry and hoppy American style pale ale using specially imported yeast and Cascade and Centennial hops.

beer.Name: Six Hop Ale
beer.Description: A sturdy malt backbone supports the huge weight of hops in this pale ale. Six different varieties are used during several stages including a big dose of dry hops while the beer conditions after fermentation.

beer.Name: Sunburst
beer.Description: A hint of initial sweetness adds to the fruitiness of this summer ale without detracting from it's clean flavour and rich hop aroma.

beer.Name: Brandeston Gold
beer.Description: A glorious golden coloured ale brewed with locally grown hops and malt. A warming fruity aroma and a deep resinous malt flavour.

beer.Name: Victoria Bitter
beer.Description: A mid amber coloured malty session bitter. A gentle fruity aroma and complex malty depths balanced by subtle bitterness.

beer.Name: Aussie Blonde
beer.Description: Australian hopped blonde beer

beer.Name: Bullseye
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Angry Ox Bitter
beer.Description: A dark and hoppy bitter which is strong and full of flavour

beer.Name: Cowgirl Gold
beer.Description: A golden ale brewed using Bramling Cross hops resulting in a beer which has a great deal of flavour and is smooth and bitter

beer.Name: Totally Tropical
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Verve
beer.Description: Session IPA

beer.Name: Cockleboats Best Bitter
beer.Description: Deep copper colour brewed using 5 Malts including some German. 2 American hop varieties make this a palate filling session ale.

beer.Name: Wakering Gold
beer.Description: The colour of summer barley and bursting with fresh hop aroma. A refreshing blend of English and American hops dominate this easy drinking session ale

beer.Name: Wallasea Wench
beer.Description: Pale copper lightly hopped smooth easy drinking session beer. Without doubt our largest seller.

beer.Name: Golden Best
beer.Description: A delightful straw-coloured pale ale with a flowery hop (Styrian Goldings). Golden Best is a fantastic session best bitter.

beer.Name: Orange Wheat Beer
beer.Description: Orange Wheat Beer is light with grainy citrus & marmalade flavours.

beer.Name: Red Herring
beer.Description: A rich fruity red ale brewed with Oak and Beech smoked malt giving the beer a subtle Smokey flavour with a dry Smokey finish.

beer.Name: Hamlet
beer.Description: Standard English Session bitter brewed with Challenger and Styrian Goldings

beer.Name: EPA 100
beer.Description: Brewed to commemorate the Centenary of the Electric Palace Cinema in Harwich this is a classic pale, hoppy premium ale â€“ full of character but with a smooth finish.

beer.Name: Phoenix APA
beer.Description: Lingering malt sweetness is balanced with smooth bitterness throughout. Barley sugar notes and an unmistakable Cascade nose.

beer.Name: Snake Oil Stout
beer.Description: Black as Satan's heart. We used 5 English malts and 2 hop varieties to brew this devilishly moreish venomous reptile of a beer.

beer.Name: SX Devil
beer.Description: Light brown, well balanced, full-flavoured ale.

beer.Name: Back In Black
beer.Description: Very dark and hoppy a black IPA.

beer.Name: Old English
beer.Description: Brown malty in the style of and 'old ale'.

beer.Name: SX Demon
beer.Description: A DARK AND COMPLEX ALEBREWED WITH LOTS OF CHOCOLATE MALT ANDA TOUCH OF BLACK MALT. HOPPED WITH MARYNKA FUGGLES AND BREWER`S GOLD.

beer.Name: Hotel Porter
beer.Description: A dark, smooth porter.

beer.Name: Bismarck
beer.Description: A smooth best bitter made with Munich malt and 3 different German hops

beer.Name: Farmers I.P.A.
beer.Description: It's a bit light to be a true IPA but its certainly hoppy. An amber coloured beer flavoured by Crystal & Chocolate malts balanced with Challenger and Fuggle hops.

beer.Name: Hotspur
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Puck's Folly
beer.Description: A pale golden ale.The use of East Kent Goldings hops gives the beer a more spicy character than other golden ales with pineapple on the aroma and taste.

beer.Name: Amber - Unfined
beer.Description: Vegan-friendly, unfined malty US-style amber ale. Hazy.

beer.Name: Pale - Unfined
beer.Description: Vegan-friendly, unfined American pale ale. Hazy.

beer.Name: Midsummer Gold
beer.Description: Light crisp and sparkling beer brewed with East Anglian malted barley. The presence of First Gold hops gives a refreshing finish.

beer.Name: Suffolk Pride
beer.Description: A full bodied strong bitter light in colour with a powerful bouquet of hops and developed fruit with a deep dry finish.

beer.Name: Skippers
beer.Description: Best Bitter

beer.Name: Island Gold
beer.Description: Brewed with Lager Malt and Hops especially chosen for a Lager/Pilsner style of ale.

beer.Name: Oyster
beer.Description: Our recipe for a traditional Oyster Ale using lots of oats a mixture of light and dark malts and a small amount of Fuggles hops. The brew has local Mersea Island Oysters added to it giving it a distinct unique flavour.

beer.Name: Yo Boy
beer.Description: A session bitter with great tastes of Maris Otter and Crystal malt combined with Fuggles Challenger Phoenix & Cascade hops giving a long lasting bitterness on the finish.

beer.Name: Captain Bob
beer.Description: A traditional deep amber coloured bitter brewed with the distinctive Nelson Sauvin hop from New Zealand. The aroma is fruity and hoppy on the palate; there is a slighty sweet maltiness that balances an easy going bitterness that is followed by hints of gooseberry elderflower and grape in the finish.

beer.Name: Endeavour
beer.Description: April 2017 special: Traditional ale brewed with the new English hop variety Endeavour. A biscuity maltiness and subtle blackcurrant grapefruit and spice aroma characterises this ale.

beer.Name: Helios
beer.Description: June 2017 special, A blonde ale brewed with Ahtanum hops, a hop we haven't used before; this promises to give a fresh floral citrus and lemon aroma.

beer.Name: Oscar Wilde
beer.Description: A wonderfully mellow moreish dark mild. Brewed using Maris Otter Pale Crystal and Black malts and gently hopped with Challenger.

beer.Name: White Willow
beer.Description: June 2017 special. A strong pale wheat beer. Refreshing very drinkable with an unusual apricot and peach hop aroma.

beer.Name: Pekko
beer.Description: Light golden and floral, with tropical and citrus notes

beer.Name: Shine On
beer.Description: Lightly tropical with hints of zesty freshness. A sharp more-ish beer.

beer.Name: Cavalier
beer.Description: A crisp pale ale hopped with American Cascade and Galena hops.

beer.Name: Vanguard
beer.Description: An easy drinking ale light-brown in colour made with 6 types of English malt and generously hopped with American and English varieties

beer.Name: Corsair
beer.Description: A hearty red/brown ale, brewed especially for the Thurrock Beer Festival.

beer.Name: Maia
beer.Description: Spring pale ale

beer.Name: Milkshake Stout
beer.Description: Rich and sweet milk stout brewed with oats chocolate and biscuit malt and infused with vanilla.

beer.Name: Inferno
beer.Description: This light igniting ale flickers complex fruits across your tongue leaving a dry fruity bitter finish smothering your thirst.

beer.Name: JHB
beer.Description: A golden beer with hops and fruit on the palate balanced by malt and a bitter base. Dry hoppy finish with soft fruit flavours. CBOB 2001.

beer.Name: Dark Side of the Moose
beer.Description: Dark chestnut brown bitter with smoky treacle on the nose and a crisp bitter finish.

beer.Name: Gelert
beer.Description: A full-bodied golden best-bitter with hints of pine in the aroma and finished with lingering grapefruit and toffee.

beer.Name: Brewery Monkey
beer.Description: Awaiting tasting notes from brewer.

beer.Name: Hunter's Gold
beer.Description: A golden beer made from English Extra Pale malt with an orange citrus aroma from Super Styrian Goldings.

beer.Name: Wily Ol' Fox
beer.Description: A premium aromatic amber ale made from English Boadicea hops and East Anglian Pale Maris Otter malt.

beer.Name: Wolf
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Chelmer Gold
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Hill Street Pale
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Signal Hill
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Agnes Waterhouse
beer.Description: A coffee porter brewed with chocolate and dark crystal malts to give rich aromas of molasses & coffee

beer.Name: Essex Serpent
beer.Description: Deep reddish brown ale. A rich velvety smooth beer with hints of roasted nuts and fruity floral aromas

beer.Name: Oracle
beer.Description: A crisp sparklingly sunflower gold ale with a striking hop profile. Dry and refreshing with a long balanced aromatic finish.

beer.Name: Shropshire Gold
beer.Description: Golden with a flora aroma and a full hoppy flavour that is balanced by a crisp dry maltiness and a rich finish.

beer.Name: Barnfield Bitter
beer.Description: Light brown produced using Golding hops to give a pleasantly drinkable bitterness.

beer.Name: Braintree Market Ale
beer.Description: Traditional easy drinking session beer a hoppy lingering dry bitter finish.

beer.Name: Hyde Bitter
beer.Description: A light amber coloured bitter brewed with Optic malt and target hops full bodied with a warm malty undertone.

beer.Name: Molly's Jolly Mild
beer.Description: A dark and delicious mild with rich malts smooth roast chocolate and coffee for a moreish mellow flavour.

beer.Name: Old Man Shirv
beer.Description: Like the legend this copper coloured premium ale is full of character. A smooth and fruity ale using classic Fuggles and Challenger whole hops with a rich malt flavour that leaves a lasting impression.

beer.Name: Veteran Campaigner
beer.Description: A true amber session beer loaded with quality Goldings whole hops for a refreshing honesty. Like the real Veteran Campaigner its been there done it seen it and will continue to do so.

beer.Name: Whacker Payne
beer.Description: The chosen golden beer. With real flowing blonde beer it`s one you cant take your eyes off. It packs a whack of crisp golden refreshment with subtle citrus hints. Beauty is in the glass of the real beer holder

beer.Name: Golden Arrow
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Ruby Red
beer.Description: A tawny red ale with subtle malt undertones and a distinctive spicy hop aroma from Cascade hops. Ruby Red won a Silver Medal in the 2010 International Beer Challenge.

beer.Name: Lord Marples
beer.Description: Surprisingly smooth with light toffee and caramel characters a mixture of floral and spicy hop notes and a pleasing bitter finish

beer.Name: Wild Swan
beer.Description: Wild Swan is white gold in colour with aromas of light bitter lemon a hint of herb and a subtle spiciness. A great session beer!

beer.Name: Drop Bar
beer.Description: This is a beer to drink all night long and all year round. A slower low temperature fermentation and dry hopping with Mosaic yields crisp flavours., subtle bitterness and a gentle floral tropical fruit aroma.

beer.Name: Little Bird
beer.Description: a solid base of Munich Wheat and Vienna malts. Hop flavour is built and layered by the addition of hops throughout the boil. Dry hopping with Amarillo adds the final citrus touch.

beer.Name: Apprentice
beer.Description: Golden in colour hoppy nose and definitely a session beer.

beer.Name: Dengie IPA
beer.Description: A popular bitter to tempt those who like a darker malty brew with plenty of flavour not too much hop and at a strength where you can make a night of it.

beer.Name: Hop Springs Eternal
beer.Description: A golden ale with Polish and English hops

beer.Name: Hoptimistic
beer.Description: A fantastic traditional ale using finest floor malted malt and a blend of Goldings and Galena to give a wholesome flavour with a gentle blackcurrant finish

beer.Name: Scruffy Mild
beer.Description: A traditional dark mild.

beer.Name: The Beer That Has No Name
beer.Description: A traditional English pale ale.

root.beer: The Beer That Has No Name
